subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Floyd Mayweather Jr., the International Boxing Federation welterweight champion, has agreed to fight Carlos Baldomir, the World Boxing Council welterweight champion, on Nov. 4 at Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas. Mayweather (36-0) is considered the world’s best pound-for-pound boxer. Baldomir (43-9-6) has not lost since 1998, and is coming off impressive victories this year over Zab Judah and Arturo Gatti.
